column4: i was looking around for madwifi notes but it was claimed as buggy at best
i use madwifi on my acer (aspire one netbook)

well the aspire one is x86 32-bit, but you may still find this a relevant place to start with madwifi on acer atheros https://help.ubuntu.com/community/AspireOne110L.  there may also be a seperate article on other acer
